title: Kailangan Ko'y Ikaw (soundtrack)
text:
Kailangan Ko'y Ikaw is the <a href="soundtrack">soundtrack</a> to the 2000 <a href="VIVA%20Films">Viva Films</a> <a href="Comedy%20film">comedy</a> and <a href="romance%20film">romance film</a> of <a href="Kailangan%20Ko%27y%20Ikaw">the same name</a> starring <a href="Regine%20Velasquez">Regine Velasquez</a> and <a href="Robin%20Padilla">Robin Padilla</a>. The soundtrack was released by Viva Records on 2000 in CD and cassette format. With the film's immense success, the single "Kailangan Ko'y Ikaw" shot to the top of the charts and the soundtrack sold more than 240,000+ copies in the <a href="Philippines">Philippines</a>.
Content.
The carrier single is the song "Kailangan Ko'y Ikaw" composed by <a href="Ogie%20Alcasid">Ogie Alcasid</a> which was requested by Regine Velasquez to be the main love theme of the film. The song was created for only a day by Alcasid during his then wife Michelle Van Eimeren's second child pregnancy. The album went gold certified by the <a href="Philippine%20Association%20of%20the%20Record%20Industry">Philippine Association of the Record Industry</a> (PARI) after a week upon release and turned platinum award after a month and considered one of the best selling soundtracks by a Filipino movie in the Philippines.
Accolades.
The song "Kailangan Ko'y Ikaw" received numerous awards and citation from different Philippine awards program including <a href="Awit%20Awards">Awit Awards</a>, <a href="Filipino%20Academy%20of%20Movie%20Arts%20and%20Sciences%20Award">Filipino Academy of Movie Arts & Sciences</a> (FAMAS) Awards and PMPC Star Awards for Movies.
Personnel.
The album was produced by Regine Velasquez and Raul Mitra.
